title: Result of increase in U.S. imports in ForEx

content.prompt: An increase in United States imports will result in which of the following in foreign exchange markets?

choices.label: Increased foreign demand for United States dollars
Increased United States demand for foreign currencies
A decrease in the value of foreign currencies
An increase in the value of the United States dollar

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
